name: Fun Run Clone - Phaser 3 Prototype
title: Fun Run Clone - Phaser 3 Prototype
short_description: Fun Run Game Clone - Phaser 3 Game Prototype
long_description: A simple prototype of a "Fun Run" clone game developed using Phaser, a popular HTML5 game framework. The game is a 2D platformer where players control a character to navigate obstacles and reach the finish line.

name: Bootstrap5 Minimalist Dashboard
title: Bootstrap5 Minimalist Dashboard
short_description: Bootstrap 5 Minimalist design template for admin dashboard
long_description: Minimalist is a minimalist design template for admin dashboard. This is made with all the latest frameworks such as Bootstrap 5, HTML5 & CSS3. This template is SEO-optimized and ranks higher in search engine results. It comes with quicker page loading time and reduces wait time for visitors. The template comes with a well-chosen color scheme and fully responsive UI components laid out on it. Its user-friendly components include 10 HTML pages, 5 UI components, one basic dashboard, a well-commented codebase, an on-hover effect, a burger menu, and many more.

name: React.js Home Repairs Management
title: React.js Home Repairs Management
short_description: A ReactJS web application to manage all of your home repairs such as: workers, repairs, payments & worklog
long_description: Are you ready to simplify your life and stay on top of all your home repair tasks? With the ReactJS Home Repairs Management app, you can effortlessly manage every aspect of your home repairs, all in one place.

name: React.js Google Keep Clone
title: React.js Google Keep Clone
short_description: This project is a clone of Google Keep, a note-taking application developed by Google. It was built using React and Material UI

name: React.js Chat Application
title: React.js Chat Application
short_description: ReactJS chat application with websocket & bootstrap - including authentication pages, responsive design & captcha
long_description: The app boasts a plethora of functionalities, including one-to-one and group chat, a contact list, file sharing, online user tracking, and message read/unread status. We have also included authentication pages to enhance security. Additionally, our app offers multi-language support through an i18n JSON object, making it accessible to a wider audience.

name: PassHub
title: PassHub
short_description: A password management system
long_description: A safe place to place all of your passwords, With encryption and other security methods

name: SuSearch
title: SuSearch
short_description: A Fuzzy JavaScript Library That Allows You To Search In A Large Amount Of Data
long_description: Introducing SuSearch, the JavaScript plugin for fast and efficient fuzzy search in large datasets. With SuSearch, you can easily search based on specific settings and conditions, using a powerful algorithm and a sleek dropdown display of results. SuSearch is the go-to tool for developers who need customizable fuzzy search functionality in their web applications.

title: Multiplayer Zombie Survival 2D

long_description: This project involves creating a first-person shooter game with features such as ammo, weapons, a wall shop, and a money system. The game is currently in progress.
